document.text:
From: 
To: 
Cc: ' , ' 
Subject: Re: Mark Epstein 
Date: Mon, 28 Oct 2019 22:02:09 +0000 
I really apologize. I really did not recognize a plan for the 28th - I could not have taken that plan 
Sent from my iPhone 
On 
Oct 28, 2019, at 6:00 PM, 
I am sony I would not have confirmed for today. I had a 4 pm doctors appointment scheduled for months. I  had 
told mark 10/31 as well. My apologies. Can we still do 10/31? 
Sent from my iPhone 
On 
Oct 28, 2019, at 5:51 PM, > wrote: 
Hi 
Per my email on 
October 24 below, we were confirmed for Monday (which was today, October 28). 
From: 
Sent: Monday, October 28, 2019 5:27 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: Mark Epstein 
Greetings. We are set for 10/31 at three per your direction. Did I miss an update? 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Oct 28, 2019, at 3:12 PM, 
> 
wrote: 
Hi 
Are you en route? Thanks. 
On Oct 24, 2019, at 10:55 AM, 
> 
wrote: 
EFTA00009854

We are confirmed for a  meeting at 3:00 p.m. on Monday at . See you then. Thanks. 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
Tel: 
EFTA00009855
